data.name: Portfolio Website (paundra0217.github.io, this website)
data.description: Built a personal portfolio website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Motion.dev to showcase projects and professional experience. Implemented a responsive design with optimized performance and deployed the site for cross-device accessibility.

data.name: Drawing Board
data.description: Co-developed a collaborative drawing board application in Unity (C#) within one week as part of a 2-person programming team. Delivered a functional build used by attendees at a public event organized by a state-owned enterprise.

data.name: Meeting Scheduler
data.description: Currently developing a full-stack web application with React, Laravel, and MySQL as a personal project. Rebuilt the system from an earlier MVP, introducing a refined database schema, optimized backend logic, and new features for appointment scheduling and management. Current preview image/GIF shown is the old legacy version, new revamp version is under development.

data.name: Batavia Outbreak
data.description: Led development of an MVP interactive application as a solo programmer within a 3-person project team, designing and implementing the core system architecture, user interface, and key features using Unity (C#). Delivered a functional prototype showcasing the concept despite limited resources.

data.name: Echoes Beneath
data.description: Built user interfaces and backend logic for a collaborative 3D software application using Unity (C#), implementing responsive menus, settings, and core system functionality for an interactive user experience.

data.name: Peak
data.description: Served as the sole programmer in a 5-person game development team, responsible for implementing core mechanics, UI systems, and underlying architecture in Unity (C#). Translated design and art concepts into interactive features, ensuring smooth gameplay and system performance.
